modules.name: Server Routes
modules.description: This module handles all the HTTP API endpoints for the application. It contains 16 route files covering: actions, activity, backlog, brain, changelog, codebase, and 10 more. Routes receive HTTP requests, process them, and return JSON responses. It reads and writes data to the persistence layer.

modules.name: UI Views
modules.description: These are the main pages of the web application - what users see and interact with. Includes 12 screens: Actions, Backlog, Changelog, Codebase, CodebaseGraph, Dashboard, and 6 more. Each page fetches data from the API and renders interactive UI.
modules.shortDescription: 12 main screens of the web app

modules.name: Server Integrations
modules.description: Handles connections to external tools and services. Integrates with: cloudflare, github, helicone, sentry, vercel. Each integration can be configured with API credentials and provides data to the rest of the application.
modules.shortDescription: Connects to external services (cloudflare, github, helicone, sentry, vercel)

modules.name: Server
modules.description: The core server that runs the application. It starts the HTTP server, mounts API routes, and manages the application lifecycle. Connects to: helicone, deepgram, sentry.
modules.shortDescription: Core HTTP server and application entry point

modules.name: UI
modules.description: Configuration files that control how the project is built, tested, and deployed.

modules.name: UI Components
modules.description: A library of reusable UI components that the pages are built from. Contains 9 components: NodeDetailPanel, Sidebar, HealthDot, SizeBadge, StatusBadge.... These handle individual pieces of the interface like buttons, panels, cards, and visualizations.

modules.name: UI
modules.description: This module contains 4 files with 277 lines of code. Key exports: App, useWebSocket.

modules.name: CLI
modules.description: Provides a command-line interface for interacting with the application from the terminal.

modules.name: Shared
modules.description: Contains shared type definitions and data structures used across the project. Defines 57 types and interfaces. This ensures the server, UI, and other modules all agree on the shape of data.
modules.shortDescription: Shared type definitions and data structures
